game

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Player

  • public class Player
extends Object
    The Player class contains a Board object, which the class uses to do the actions a real player would do in a game of Battleship. Additionally the class contains a String for the name of the player. Most of the Board classes properties are used through he player class.
    Author:
    tolaakso

      The player must place ships on the board before the game can start.
      void rotateShip(Ship ship)
      rotateShip method is intended to be used is a game where the ships can move, which is no possible at the moment.

      • placeShip

        public boolean placeShip(Ship ship,
                int x,
                int y)
        The player must place ships on the board before the game can start. This function is used to place the 'ship' into a (x,y) square found on the board.
        Parameters:
        ship - - ship which has size and direction defined
        x - - the x paramater for the square
        y - - the y parameter for the square
        Returns:
